text:
Annulled Convictions Order 2014

I, the Lieutenant-Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, make the following order under the Annulled Convictions Act 2003 .

18 June 2014

A. M. BLOW

Lieutenant-Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

Dr. Vanessa Goodwin

Minister for Justice

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Annulled Convictions Order 2014 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which the provisions of the Registration to Work with Vulnerable People Act 2013 commence.

3. Principal Act
    In this order, the Annulled Convictions Act 2003 is referred to as the Principal Act.

4.
    The amendments effected by this clause have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Annulled Convictions Act 2003 .

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 25 June 2014

This order is administered in the Department of Justice.
